name: Rossi, Appellant, v. General Teamsters, Chauffeurs, Helpers and Yardmen, Local Union No. 470
name_abbreviation: Rossi v. General Teamsters, Chauffeurs, Helpers & Yardmen, Local Union No. 470

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagen, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The decree is affirmed.
Each party to bear own costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Rossi, Appellant, v. General Teamsters, Chauffeurs, Helpers and Yardmen, Local Union No. 470.
